activities.name: Contract and Assistance b2s
activities.description: Process the entire historical data from the bronze to the silver layer

activities.name: External Data B2S
activities.description:
Run the External Data B2S Pipeline which includes notebooks for: 
- County Education
- County GDP
- County Population
- County Presidential 
- Congressional District House

activities.name: Create SQL Tables
activities.description: Create all of the tables that are in our Synapse Data Warehouse

scripts.text:
CREATE SCHEMA Prod
GO

CREATE TABLE Prod.DimAgency(
    agency_code VARCHAR(8000),
    agency_name VARCHAR(8000)
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
);

-- CREATE TABLE DimDisasterEmergencyFund (
--     disaster_emergency_fund_code VARCHAR(8000) PRIMARY KEY,
--     code_name VARCHAR(8000) NOT NULL
-- )

-- CREATE TABLE DimObjectClass (
--     object_class_code BIGINT PRIMARY KEY,
--     object_class_name VARCHAR(8000) NOT NULL
-- )

CREATE TABLE Prod.DimCongressionalDistrict(
    cd_original VARCHAR(8000),
    cd_code BIGINT,--VARCHAR(8000),
    party_2018 VARCHAR(8000),
    party_2020 VARCHAR(8000),
    party_2022 VARCHAR(8000)
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
);

CREATE TABLE Prod.DimHighlyCompensatedOfficer(
    hco_name VARCHAR(8000),
    hco_code BIGINT
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
);

CREATE TABLE Prod.DimCountry(
    country_code VARCHAR(8000),
    country_name VARCHAR(8000)
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
);

CREATE TABLE Prod.DimRecipient(
    recipient_uei VARCHAR(8000),
    recipient_name_raw VARCHAR(8000)
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
);

CREATE TABLE Prod.DimState (
    --state_fips VARCHAR(8000) PRIMARY KEY, -- DF does not have this column
    state_abbreviation VARCHAR(8000),
    state_name VARCHAR(8000)
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
);

CREATE TABLE Prod.DimCounty(
    county_fips VARCHAR(250),
    less_than_hs_17_21 INT,
    hs_only_17_21 INT,
    some_college_17_21 INT,
    bach_or_higher_17_21 INT,
    perc_less_than_hs_17_21 FLOAT(53),
    perc_hs_only_17_21 FLOAT(53),
    perc_some_college_17_21 FLOAT(53),
    perc_bach_or_higher_17_21 FLOAT(53),
    stname VARCHAR(250),
    ctyname VARCHAR(250),
    gdp_2019 VARCHAR(250), -- need to change gold layer data type (there are commas)
    gdp_2020 VARCHAR(250), -- need to change gold layer data type (there are commas)
    gdp_2021 VARCHAR(250), -- need to change gold layer data type (there are commas)
    gdp_2022 VARCHAR(250), -- need to change gold layer data type (there are commas)
    popestimate2019 INT,
    popestimate2020 INT,
    popestimate2021 INT,
    popestimate2022 INT,
    party_2016 VARCHAR(250),
    party_2020 VARCHAR(250)
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
);

CREATE TABLE Prod.DimDate(
    date_key INT,
    calendar_date DATE,
    calendar_year INT,
    calendar_month VARCHAR(15),
    month_of_year INT,
    calendar_day VARCHAR(15),
    day_of_week INT,
    is_weekday VARCHAR(12),
    day_of_month INT,
    last_day_of_month VARCHAR(12),
    week_of_year_iso INT,
    quarter_of_year INT,
    fiscal_year INT,
    fiscal_month INT
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
);

-- Write Office Table
-- Write Cfda Table
-- Write Primary Place of Performance

CREATE TABLE Prod.FactAssistance(
    transaction_unique_key VARCHAR(8000),
    award_unique_key VARCHAR(8000),
    cfda_number VARCHAR(8000),
    face_value_of_loan DECIMAL(18,2),
    total_face_value_of_loan DECIMAL(18,2),
    original_loan_subsidy_cost DECIMAL(18,2),
    total_loan_subsidy_cost DECIMAL(18,2),
    primary_place_of_performance_scope_code BIGINT--VARCHAR(8000)
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH(transaction_unique_key),
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
);

CREATE TABLE Prod.FactTransaction(
    transaction_unique_key VARCHAR(8000),
    total_outlayed_amount_for_overall_award DECIMAL(18,2),
    prime_award_transaction_place_of_performance_county_fips_code VARCHAR(8000),
    highly_compensated_officer_4_amount DECIMAL(18,2),
    outlayed_amount_from_COVID_19_supplementals_for_overall_award VARCHAR(8000), --DECIMAL(18,2), -- DF has this as a String
    modification_number VARCHAR(8000), -- Consider Removal
    funding_office_code VARCHAR(8000),
    prime_award_transaction_place_of_performance_state_fips_code VARCHAR(8000),
    award_type VARCHAR(8000),
    recipient_uei VARCHAR(8000),
    awarding_agency_code VARCHAR(8000),
    primary_place_of_performance_country_code VARCHAR(8000),
    funding_agency_code VARCHAR(8000),
    action_type_code VARCHAR(8000),
    highly_compensated_officer_2_amount DECIMAL(18,2),
    recipient_parent_uei VARCHAR(8000), -- Consider Removal
    highly_compensated_officer_1_amount DECIMAL(18,2),
    highly_compensated_officer_3_amount DECIMAL(18,2),
    recipient_state_code VARCHAR(8000),
    program_activities_funding_this_award VARCHAR(8000),
    award_unique_key VARCHAR(8000),
    prime_award_transaction_place_of_performance_cd_original VARCHAR(8000),
    recipient_city_name VARCHAR(8000), -- consider moving to recipient table
    prime_award_transaction_recipient_cd_current VARCHAR(8000),
    total_obligated_amount DECIMAL(18,2),
    highly_compensated_officer_5_amount DECIMAL(18,2),
    obligated_amount_from_COVID_19_supplementals_for_overall_award VARCHAR(8000), --DECIMAL(18,2), -- DF has this as a String
    recipient_country_code VARCHAR(8000),
    prime_award_transaction_recipient_county_fips_code VARCHAR(8000),
    awarding_office_code VARCHAR(8000),
    recipient_parent_name_raw VARCHAR(8000), -- Consider Removal
    prime_award_transaction_recipient_state_fips_code VARCHAR(8000),
    federal_action_obligation DECIMAL(18,2),
    action_date_key INT,
    last_modified_key INT,
    recipient_cd_code BIGINT,
    place_of_performance_cd_code BIGINT,
    highly_compensated_officer_1_code BIGINT,
    highly_compensated_officer_2_code BIGINT,
    highly_compensated_officer_3_code BIGINT,
    highly_compensated_officer_4_code BIGINT,
    highly_compensated_officer_5_code BIGINT
    -- funding_sub_agency_code VARCHAR(8000) NOT NULL,
    -- object_class_code INT,
    -- disaster_emergency_fund_codes_for_overall_award VARCHAR(8000),
    -- primary_place_of_performance_zip_4 VARCHAR(8000),
    -- primary_place_of_performance_city_name VARCHAR(8000),
    -- prime_award_transaction_place_of_performance_cd_current VARCHAR(8000),
    -- funding_sub_agency_name VARCHAR(8000),
    -- awarding_sub_agency_name VARCHAR(8000),
    -- awarding_sub_agency_code VARCHAR(8000),
    -- last_modified_date VARCHAR(8000) NOT NULL,
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH(transaction_unique_key),
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
);

CREATE TABLE Prod.DimBusinessSize
(
    business_size_key INT,
    business_size_code CHAR(1) NOT NULL,
    business_size VARCHAR(50)
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
);

CREATE TABLE Prod.DimNAICS
(
    naics_key INT,
    naics_code VARCHAR(500),
    naics_description VARCHAR(500)
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
);

CREATE TABLE Prod.DimCountryOfOrigin
(
    country_of_origin_key INT,
    country_of_origin_code VARCHAR(500),
    country_of_origin VARCHAR(500)
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
);

CREATE TABLE Prod.FactContract
(
    transaction_unique_key VARCHAR(250) NOT NULL,
    award_unique_key VARCHAR(250),
    naics_key INT,
    country_of_origin_key INT,
    business_size_key INT
   
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH(transaction_unique_key),
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
);

CREATE TABLE Prod.DimCFDA
(
    cfda_number VARCHAR(150) NOT NULL,
    cfda_title VARCHAR(500)
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
);

CREATE TABLE Prod.DimOffice
(
    office_code VARCHAR(100),
    office_name VARCHAR(200)
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
);

CREATE TABLE Prod.DimPrimaryPlaceOfPerformanceScope
(
    primary_place_of_performance_scope VARCHAR(100),
    primary_place_of_performance_scope_code BIGINT
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
);

activities.name: Load Data into Tables
activities.description: Load the data from gold layer into our create tables

scripts.text:
COPY INTO Prod.DimAgency
FROM 'https://20231113desa.dfs.core.windows.net/gold-layer/project=3/usa_spending/agency/*.parquet'
WITH (
    FILE_TYPE = 'parquet',
    CREDENTIAL = (IDENTITY='Managed Identity')
)

COPY INTO Prod.DimCongressionalDistrict
FROM 'https://20231113desa.dfs.core.windows.net/gold-layer/project=3/usa_spending/cd/*.parquet'
WITH (
    FILE_TYPE = 'parquet',
    CREDENTIAL = (IDENTITY='Managed Identity')
)

COPY INTO Prod.DimHighlyCompensatedOfficer
FROM 'https://20231113desa.dfs.core.windows.net/gold-layer/project=3/usa_spending/hco/*.parquet'
WITH (
    FILE_TYPE = 'parquet',
    CREDENTIAL = (IDENTITY='Managed Identity')
)

COPY INTO Prod.DimCountry
FROM 'https://20231113desa.dfs.core.windows.net/gold-layer/project=3/usa_spending/country/*.parquet'
WITH (
    FILE_TYPE = 'parquet',
    CREDENTIAL = (IDENTITY='Managed Identity')
)

COPY INTO Prod.DimRecipient
FROM 'https://20231113desa.dfs.core.windows.net/gold-layer/project=3/usa_spending/recipient/*.parquet'
WITH (
    FILE_TYPE = 'parquet',
    CREDENTIAL = (IDENTITY='Managed Identity')
)

COPY INTO Prod.DimState
FROM 'https://20231113desa.dfs.core.windows.net/gold-layer/project=3/usa_spending/state/*.parquet'
WITH (
    FILE_TYPE = 'parquet',
    CREDENTIAL = (IDENTITY='Managed Identity')
)

COPY INTO Prod.DimCounty
FROM 'https://20231113desa.dfs.core.windows.net/gold-layer/project=3/usa_spending/county/*.parquet'
WITH (
    FILE_TYPE = 'parquet',
    CREDENTIAL = (IDENTITY='Managed Identity')
)

COPY INTO Prod.DimDate
FROM 'https://20231113desa.dfs.core.windows.net/gold-layer/project=3/usa_spending/date/*.parquet'
WITH (
    FILE_TYPE = 'parquet',
    CREDENTIAL = (IDENTITY='Managed Identity')
)

COPY INTO Prod.FactAssistance
FROM 'https://20231113desa.dfs.core.windows.net/gold-layer/project=3/usa_spending/assistance/*.parquet'
WITH (
    FILE_TYPE = 'parquet',
    CREDENTIAL = (IDENTITY='Managed Identity')
)

COPY INTO Prod.FactTransaction
FROM 'https://20231113desa.dfs.core.windows.net/gold-layer/project=3/usa_spending/transaction/*.parquet'
WITH (
    FILE_TYPE = 'parquet',
    CREDENTIAL = (IDENTITY='Managed Identity')
)

COPY INTO Prod.DimBusinessSize
FROM 'https://20231113desa.dfs.core.windows.net/gold-layer/project=3/usa_spending/business_size/*.parquet'
WITH (
    FILE_Type = 'parquet',
    CREDENTIAL = (IDENTITY='Managed Identity')
)

COPY INTO Prod.DimNAICS
FROM 'https://20231113desa.dfs.core.windows.net/gold-layer/project=3/usa_spending/naics/*.parquet'
WITH (
    FILE_Type = 'parquet',
    CREDENTIAL = (IDENTITY='Managed Identity')
)

COPY INTO Prod.DimCountryOfOrigin
FROM 'https://20231113desa.dfs.core.windows.net/gold-layer/project=3/usa_spending/country_of_origin/*.parquet'
WITH (
    FILE_Type = 'parquet',
    CREDENTIAL = (IDENTITY='Managed Identity')
)

COPY INTO Prod.FactContract
FROM 'https://20231113desa.dfs.core.windows.net/gold-layer/project=3/usa_spending/contract/**'
WITH (
    FILE_Type = 'parquet',
    CREDENTIAL = (IDENTITY='Managed Identity')
)

COPY INTO Prod.DimCFDA
FROM 'https://20231113desa.dfs.core.windows.net/gold-layer/project=3/usa_spending/cfda/**'
WITH (
    FILE_Type = 'parquet',
    CREDENTIAL = (IDENTITY='Managed Identity')
)

COPY INTO Prod.DimOffice
FROM 'https://20231113desa.dfs.core.windows.net/gold-layer/project=3/usa_spending/office/**'
WITH (
    FILE_Type = 'parquet',
    CREDENTIAL = (IDENTITY='Managed Identity')
)

COPY INTO Prod.DimprimaryPlaceOfPerformanceScope
FROM 'https://20231113desa.dfs.core.windows.net/gold-layer/project=3/usa_spending/primary_place_of_performance_scope/**'
WITH (
    FILE_Type = 'parquet',
    CREDENTIAL = (IDENTITY='Managed Identity')
)
